name: Into the Dark (itch) (chanschatz2)
description:
Into the Dark is a top down 2D game where you fight to destroy an ancient statue of evil, buried deep within the underground system.

The bonfires act as respawn points if you die, but do not save progress after closing the game.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Left Click - Attack

CREDITS:
